sys_update_version.name: sys_transform_script_ee8ccaa8db9c6010f61cb298f49619f5
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="Cisco Assets TM">1ddd7b7adb082010083e29464896195d</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {
    /*var logger = new Cisco_BCS_SNLogger();
    var daoScript = new Cisco_DAOScript();
    try {
        logger.debug("Inside Assets Transform map.");
        var deviceid = daoScript.getReferenceMapping("devices", "device_id", target.device_id);
        target.deviceid_ref = deviceid;
        target.update();
    } catch (e) {
        logger.error("Exception caught inside assets Transform map. Error : - " + e);
    }*/
	var dao = new Cisco_DAOScript();
	//dao.insertInAssetCovered(target, "sr_no", target.serial_number+"", "contractLifecycle", false);
	
	// Devices
	var resultDevices = dao.createReferences(target.device_id, "device_id", "", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_devices", false);
	if(resultDevices){
		target.deviceid_ref = resultDevices + "";
		target.update();
	}
	
	// Field Notices
	var resultFn = dao.createReferences(target.physical_element_id, "physical_element_id", "physical_element_id_ref", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_field_notices", true);
	if(resultFn){
		target.fieldnoticeid = resultFn + "";
		target.update();
	}
	
	// HWEox
	var resultHwEox = dao.createReferences(target.physical_element_id, "physical_element_id", "physical_element_id_ref", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_hardware_lifecycle", true);
	if(resultHwEox) {
		target.hweox = resultHwEox + "";
		target.update();
	}
	
	// Contract
	var resultContract = dao.createReferences(target.serial_number, "sr_no", "asset", target.sys_id, "x_caci_cisco_bcs_cisco_contract_lifecycle", true);
	if(resultContract){
		target.contract = resultContract + "";
		target.update();
		dao.assetCalculatedFields(resultContract, target);
	}
	
// 	target.update();
	
})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harsh.gupta</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-11-02 13:13:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>ee8ccaa8db9c6010f61cb298f49619f5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onAfter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights" source="x_caci_cisco_bcs">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco BCS Operational Insights">56b8d9362f3310108956ea5ef699b62d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_ee8ccaa8db9c6010f61cb298f49619f5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-08 11:24:07</sys_updated_on><when>onAfter</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
